name: Lucy Harris (@LucyeoH)
content:
Goal:

We want to create a poster for this challenge (#39 ) that will get designers from around the world excited to help re-shape the Mozilla brand, and join the Mozilla design community.

Info:

We'll share the poster on blogs, design forums, and from our social media accounts to try and attract more people to get involved.

Style Information:

Mozilla colours + maybe reference our current brand (Follow you're creative heart)

Deadline:

March 21st.

name: Lucy Harris (@LucyeoH)
content: Re-working the ask with Tim. Will re-post shortly!

name: Lucy Harris (@LucyeoH)
content: LucyeoH                added   the     Graphic Design needed   label       Mar 16, 2016
